name: Wizard Advance
description:
Wizards Advance is a single player game  developed to promote our Artificial Intelligence company for social impact called Ninjamoba.com I've played a lot of dungeons and dragons as well as many rpg games and I wanted to make a game that had the simple elements that were what I enjoyed first about RPGS. So merry Christmas 2022!

Fighting monsters. Casting Fireballs and finding treasure in dungeons.

I would ask you to pay what you want becasue my wife was just diagnosed with inoperable pancreatic cancer and we are moving from Europe to the US to be with family and get medical care. So please pay something for the game - support social impact, and help us cope with a very difficult health problem.
